title: 253. Is the Internet Being Ruined?
description: It's a remarkable ecosystem that allows each of us to exercise control over our lives. But how much control do we truly have? How many of our decisions are really being made by Google and Facebook and Apple? And, perhaps most importantly: is the Internet's true potential being squandered?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
